evidence.claim: CSOFT Health Sciences utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and data processing.
The company is HIPAA compliant and supports various EDI standards such as X12.
CSOFT integrates with FHIR for healthcare data exchange.
They utilize Google Cloud for data analytics and cloud storage solutions.
Integration with Kafka is highlighted for real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focuses on HIPAA compliance and X12 transactions, indicating relevance for API healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: EDI transactions with payers and providers
